forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 45. North northeast wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 5 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn drapes itself gently across Downtown San Francisco, a serene clarity envelops the city. The air is crisp and still, with an inviting chill that lingers around 45 degrees, a whisper of coolness promising a refreshing day ahead. The wind is soft, barely stirring at three miles per hour, allowing the morning light to spread unimpeded. Looking towards the iconic Golden Gate Bridge, one may notice the skyline appearing distinct against the open sky, devoid of the usual fog that might cloak the city in mystery. 

Thursday greets us with a sunny disposition, as temperatures rise to the mellow embrace of 60 degrees, eventually settling into the gentle hug of 56 by afternoon. It’s a day tailor-made for wandering through the city’s storied streets or perhaps settling down with a good book in a park. Those venturing out will find it wise to layer lightly—a light jacket could serve as the perfect companion for the early hours and the subtle breeze that carries memories of distant ocean waves. A stroll along the Embarcadero, taking in the promenade’s charm, or a visit to the Ferry Building to savor its artisanal delights could present a delightful way to engage with the essence of the city and its vibrant currents on this splendid Thursday.
